title: Assam Agriculture Recruitment 2021 Online Apply 1837 Posts
description: Assam Agriculture Department Recruitment 2021: Gauhati University, External Examination Cell, Agriculture Department Assam, Khanapara has announced the latest recruitment for the Agriculture Extension Assistant (AEA), Junior Asstt (Dis. Level), Jr Asst (HQ), PI/ FI/ FS/ Computor, Stenographer, Gr-IV, Mechanic (Jute), Steno-Typist, Electrician 1837 Vacancy. Candidates who want to apply can check the Gauhati University Agriculture Department 2021 Advertisement PDF and submit their online application by the last date i.e. 5th April 2021. Check the official website xex.gauhati.ac.in for complete details of this Assam Agriculture Recruitment 2021. Direct Link to apply online available below also

title: Agriculture Department Recruitment 2021 - 1837 Grade III & IV Post
description: Gauhati University has issued a notification for the recruitment of 1837 numbers of sanctioned vacant post of Grade-III and Grade-IV Vacancy under the Agriculture Department, Assam, Khanapara and its Districts Offices. Those candidates who are interested in the Agriculture Department Assam Grade-IV & Grade-III Jobs, must read the official notification of this recruitment before applying online. The complete procedure to apply online is given below.

title: Farm Manager
description: caring of cattle and farm,coconut farming,agricultural experience,back round from agri,full time work experience,banana planting,canals,cow ,go down experience,management of accounts,staff handling,purchase and dealer meet,cost calculation,forecasting and budgeting 2.00-4.00 Years Master OF Business Administration (M.B.A)

title: Junior Agronomist
description: Roles and Responsibilities: • Lead all activities pertaining to agronomy for your respective crops, content design and its dissemination • Take initiatives to make the advisory system dynamic by incorporating pest and disease prediction, crop modelling and data analytics • Develop a catalog of agricultural recommendations for farmers based on the crop, crop stage, disease or pest risk levels etc. • Develop a calendar for when farmers will need to receive these messages • Meet with farmers to test content and ensure that recommendations are clear and unlikely to be misinterpreted • Report progress to project team, as needed • Meet all deadlines and expectations laid out in workplan and promptly communicate issues or barriers of delay or completion • Any other related task as assigned

title: Jobs Agricultural Farm House Supervisor
description: PScholarship/Contingency is awarded to Differently abled students taking admission in AICTE approved Technical institution at Degree/ Diploma. Scholarship given @ Rs 50000 as incidentals each year.

title: Agricultural Engineering Jobs 2021- 4557 latest Jobs
description: Agricultural Engineering vacancy:- Here we have a wide range of entry-level irrigation/ Agricultural Engineering jobs in India. It is not easy to describe what, exactly irrigation/Agricultural entry-level jobs are like because they vary from one position to the next and also some professionals might work behind the computer in your standard, everyday office. Like others are out in the field, actually designing and/or troubleshooting various pieces of equipment. Every year lakhs of students are applying for this Agricultural Engineering jobs as of now there were about of 54809 Agricultural Engineering jobs were available. This time it has many post vacancies available for students such as Programm Co-ordinator, Service Engineer, Farming, Agricultural Inspector, Agricultural Scientists, Production Engineer, etc.
